solution_line_template: Last year's winner ate {hamburgers_last_year_winner_ate} hamburgers because {ounces_last_year_winner_ate} / {ounces_per_hamburger} = <<{ounces_last_year_winner_ate}/{ounces_per_hamburger}={hamburgers_last_year_winner_ate}>>{hamburgers_last_year_winner_ate}

She needs to eat {hamburgers_tonya_needs_to_eat} hamburgers because {hamburgers_last_year_winner_ate} + {one_more_hamburger} = <<{hamburgers_last_year_winner_ate}+{one_more_hamburger}={hamburgers_tonya_needs_to_eat}>>{hamburgers_tonya_needs_to_eat}
